ai-tika-s0401t4:1_3: This is the third ground for criticism.
ai-tika-s0401t4:1_4: The third, fourth, seated, the first half-month: such as the Teacher.
ai-tika-s0401t4:2_1: Don’t give rise to confidence in those without it.’
ai-tika-s0401t4:3_1: Nine carrying pools of the four pairs of garments, one-footed flowers, and a hundred leagues long.
ai-tika-s0401t4:4_0: The canonical text of the Ājīvaka ascetics is finished.
